Generated Narrative: CodeSystem recommendation-strength

Last updated: 2024-04-24 00:00:00+0000

This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/recommendation-strength defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
strong StrongStrong recommendation.
weak WeakWeak recommendation.

name: StrengthOfRecommendationRating
title: StrengthOfRecommendationRating
description: A rating system that describes the strength of the recommendation, such as the GRADE, DynaMed, or HGPS systems.
